ai-tika-s0303t8:1_0: (but) those born in the bowls of the birds (winds),
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_1: endowed with (giving) colour and splendour (good) colour,
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_2: For this one wieldingly has the meaning of virtue.
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_3: In the first of the texts occurred in the first phrase as already described.
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_4: (these) it shakes the ocean to pull up and down from the ocean to the mountain. In order to win it, the mountains (of the mountains).
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_6: To step forward to accumulate a cow, and to put out the abode of ropes, and to pull out of the abode.
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_7: Saying, “After going” and she said, “After embarrasses,” and she said, “We shall give!” and so on.
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_8: Herein, although mistakenness is called “great pride” in the sense of urgency and instance, they are stated in the sense of being authority.
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_9: Seven where they dwelt here, oppressed by for seven months,
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_10: Earth, endowed with earth, like the mountains,
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_12: But no one able to remove a _kahāpaṇa_.
ai-tika-s0303t8:1_13: The meaning is this: “He should be understood” included in the same way as given under the word Vinaya and pointed in the way already stated . Herein, the meaning is this word sutta should be understood according to the word “bath.”
ai-tika-s0303t8:2_0: The Linked Discourses on phoenixes is finished.
